short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that hides anime posters on Kitsu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings back a highly requested feature to Kitsu, the anime discovery platform. Easily hide anime titles you've already watched, making it simpler to explore new shows without distractions. Perfect for streamlining your search and keeping your browsing experience clean.
